title: Robots of Mars - The Well of Doom: Part 2
description: The continuation of Sparkyâ€™s adventures on Mars, this time on a mission to the Well of Doom where Sparky must retrieve the Jewel of Power from an ancient Martian who is surrounded by Guardian Skeletons protecting the jewel. In the Well, Sparky is confronted by the Supervisor of Mars who is intent on taking the jewel for himself. Will Sparky make it out of the Well of Doom? Find out!
author: Don  Fox
